body.name: Desert Essence Tea Tree Oil Whitening Plus Mouthwash 16 fl oz - Non-GMO, Gluten Free, Vegan, Cruelty Free, Sugar Free, Alcohol Free - Deeply Cleanses & Brightens Teeth - Spearmint & Wintergreen
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 3 hrs 20 mins
features: Made with inherently cleansing botanicals, this plant-powered whitening mouthwash is purely sugar and alcohol-free

Bamboo Juice helps remove surface stains and whiten teeth, while Aloe helps soothe minor gum problems. Australian Eco-Harvest Tea Tree Oil and Zinc Citrate helps defend against cavity-forming sugar acids and buildup
A cool burst of Spearmint and Wintergreen leaves your breath fresh
Non-GMO Project Certified, Fluoride Free, Gluten Free, Vegan, Cruelty Free
NO: Parabens, Sodium Lauryl/Laureth Sulfates, phthalates, artificial fragrances or colors, silicones, EDTA, propylene glycol, mineral oil, petrolatum or paraffincids
body.description: Nothing Brightens Your Look Like A Healthy Smile. Brush Up On Your Dental Care Routine With Our Natural Products Formulated With Powerful But Gentle Ingredients Like Tea Tree Oil, Fennel, And Mint. Free Of Gluten, Fluoride, And Harsh Abrasives, They Help Give Teeth A Natural, Deep Clean. Natural Tea Tree Oil Whitening Mouthwash. Brightens Teeth And Freshens Breath. Helps Soothe Gums.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Just started using. Seems to be a little brighter so far. Will continue to use and update review.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product at a very reasonable price.
reviews.reviewText: This is a high quality mouthwash with Tea Tree Oil that cost me the same as the smaller size version from another seller. You can feel it working when you first try it. Will buy again from this seller.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Artificial sweetener free
reviews.reviewText: Very, very difficult to find a whitening mouthwash with no artificial sweetener. This one has none and thus, no artificial sweetener aftertaste. Refreshing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: So far I like it. I haven’t noticed any whitening yet. That’s why I only gave it 4 stars. I’ll follow up after I’ve used it a bit longer and share those results.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the Tea Tree in this
reviews.reviewText: I've been searching for a mouthwash that is antiseptic without containing alcohol or peppermint (a personal sensitivity). This has been the best I've come across. It finally makes my mouth feel clean. I don't love the taste, but without peppermint (and with the tea tree in it) I think it's as good as can be expected.I do love the clean feeling that I get every morning when I use it. I've tried both this flavor and the spearmint and they are both equally palatable to me. I love the healthful and natural ingredients as well as the antiseptic properties.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best cruelty free mouthwash I've tried
reviews.reviewText: Finally found it. This was the 5th mouthwash on my cruelty free search and this is definitely the winner. Great taste and it's the only mouthwash I've ever found (Crest and Colgate included) that actually feels like it cleans the teeth. A lot of people have told me to go with the regular tea tree mouthwash by Desert Essence but it tasted horrible and (in my opinion) only did a mediocre job of cleaning my teeth and no whitening to be seen. This does taste pretty strongly of mint so if that's not your cup of tea I'd avoid it but if you're looking for a good cruelty free mouthwash that freshens breath and leaves your teeth clean, TRY THIS. Better than both Jason and Auromere.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 7, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bold and fresh taste makes your mouth feel really fresh!
reviews.reviewText: I was using Desert Essence Tea Tree Oil and spearmint mouthwash before ordering this. I loved the taste of that flavor too, but wanted to try one that whitens as well. While I prefer spearmint to peppermint as far as minty flavors, this one is excellent for a peppermint. It really zaps your mouth with a clean taste and makes your mouth tingle with a cool, fresh taste. I definitely will buy this one again. Too early to say if it does a great job of whitening yet, because I just got it, and that usually takes a little time and regular use, so I'll let you know about that later. For now I'm really happy I tried this one!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not my favorite taste
reviews.reviewText: This may be a great product, but I couldn't stand the taste. It may be a great product, but I tried it once and threw it away.
